com.ibm.team.interop.client.rest

Interface IRestExternalRepositoryConnection


  • public interface IRestExternalRepositoryConnection
    Class to represent an ExternalRepositoryConnection object that is marshaled via the Interop REST service.
    Since:
    0.7

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getConnectionInfo()
      Get the connection info for this ExternalRepositoryConnection object.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Get the name of this ExternalRepositoryConnection object.
      java.lang.String getUserId()
      Get any user identity needed for authentication for this ExternalRepositoryConnection object.
      void setConnectionInfo(java.lang.String info)
      Set the connection info for this ExternalRepositoryConnection object.
      void setName(java.lang.String name)
      Set the name of this ExternalRepositoryConnection object.
      void setPassword(java.lang.String password)
      Set any password needed for authentication for this ExternalRepositoryConnection object.
      void setProjectArea(IInteropProjectAreaDTO projectArea)
      Set the project area for this ExternalRepositoryConnection object.
      void setUserId(java.lang.String userId)
      Set any user identity needed for authentication for this ExternalRepositoryConnection object.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Get the name of this ExternalRepositoryConnection object.
        Returns:
        the name of this ExternalRepositoryConnection; never null if retrieved from the server

      • setName

        void setName(java.lang.String name)
        Set the name of this ExternalRepositoryConnection object.
        Parameters:
        name - the name for this ExternalRepositoryConnection; must not be null or empty

      • getConnectionInfo

        java.lang.String getConnectionInfo()
        Get the connection info for this ExternalRepositoryConnection object.
        Returns:
        the connection info for this ExternalRepositoryConnection; may be null or empty

      • setConnectionInfo

        void setConnectionInfo(java.lang.String info)
        Set the connection info for this ExternalRepositoryConnection object.
        Parameters:
        info - the connection info for this ExternalRepositoryConnection; may be null or empty

      • getUserId

        java.lang.String getUserId()
        Get any user identity needed for authentication for this ExternalRepositoryConnection object.
        Returns:
        any user identity needed for authentication; may be null or empty

      • setUserId

        void setUserId(java.lang.String userId)
        Set any user identity needed for authentication for this ExternalRepositoryConnection object.
        Parameters:
        userId - optional user identity; may be null or mepty

      • setPassword

        void setPassword(java.lang.String password)
        Set any password needed for authentication for this ExternalRepositoryConnection object.

        Note that the password cannot be fetched via this interface, so there is no getPassword method.

        Parameters:
        password - optional password; may be null or empty

      • setProjectArea

        void setProjectArea(IInteropProjectAreaDTO projectArea)
        Set the project area for this ExternalRepositoryConnection object.
        Parameters:
        projectArea - the project area that should define the permissions for modifying this ExternalRepositoryConnection object; must not be null
